title: Writing files
summary: Write a String to a file with one line.
explanation: Files.writeString() writes content to a file with UTF-8 encoding by default. Options can be passed for appending, creating, etc.

whyModernWins.title: One line
whyModernWins.desc: No writer wrapping or try-with-resources needed.

whyModernWins.title: Safe defaults
whyModernWins.desc: UTF-8 encoding, proper file handle cleanup.

whyModernWins.title: Options
whyModernWins.desc: Pass OpenOption flags for append, create, etc.
